aboutText:
Hi! I'm Toshifumi Kamino — a creative individual with both Norwegian and Japanese roots. My journey began in Japan, where I studied violin making and repair at a vocational school, gaining hands-on skills in crafting and restoring violins, violas, and cellos.

After graduating, I moved to Norway and attended a Folkehøyskole to explore my interest in hunting and fishing. Over time, my passion shifted toward digital creativity — especially web design and video editing.

I launched a personal blog using WordPress to share photos and videos, which I edit myself. This sparked a deep interest in IT and digital tools, motivating me to pursue further learning. I started with Cyberlink and later advanced to Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects, gaining experience in basic editing, color grading, and smooth transitions.

In 2024, I joined a course called Digitale Talenter, where I deepened my knowledge of web development. I began with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and progressed to modern frameworks like React and Next.js.

In parallel, I’ve been teaching myself 3D modeling using Blender. From creating simple shapes to building complex character models, this journey continues to inspire my curiosity and creativity.

I'm passionate about combining technology and creativity — and I'm excited to keep building, learning, and sharing my work with the world.

flagQuiz.title: Flag Quiz
flagQuiz.description:
A React-based Flag Quiz web app built with Tailwind CSS that challenges users to identify 30 national flags per game.
It features dark mode, real-time correct/incorrect sound effects, and a top-10 high-score leaderboard stored in localStorage.
